item.title: Carl Zimmer
item.description: Old familiar faces are not unique to us. Chimpanzees and bonobos show signs of recognizing ape acquaintances after more than 26 years. Here‚Äôs my story on the deep roots of long-term social memories. Gift link: https://www.nytimes.com/2023/12/18/science/chimpanzee-memory-faces.html?mwgrp=a-mbar&unlocked_article_code=1.G00.fWsh.BnMzubb4ZJ9B&smid=url-share

item.title: Max Kennerly
item.description:
Again: if Thomas was a judge on any court except SCOTUS, this would be a no-brainer. It's bribery. He and everyone involved, like Harlan Crow, would be indicted.But we're supposed to pretend it's okay because it's SCOTUS.
https://www.propublica.org/article/clarence-thomas-money-complaints-sparked-resignation-fears-scotus

item.title: Sheena Cruickshank
item.description: This is just one egregious example of the VIP lane. item.title: Armin Lak
item.description: How do animals learn from na√Øve to expert? What role does dopamine play? Find out in our new paper: https://biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/2023.12.14.571653v1. We find that mice exhibit diverse yet systematic learning trajectories as they learn a perceptual decision task.Dopamine in the dorsolateral striatum reflects diverse yet systematic behavioral learning trajectories. A neural network model, trained with dopamine-like teaching signals, reproduces the mice‚Äôs learning trajectories. The model‚Äôs learning dynamics are governed by saddle points, which establish a systematic flow through the space of behavior, explaining the diverse yet systematic learning trajectories.

item.title: d a t green
item.description: Less than a year now to the end of this 2019 Parliament, by automatic operation of law.This means that the government has less than a year to get any new primary legislation through parliament, and with no scope for using Parliament Acts to defy the Lords.The end is in sight.

item.title: Frank Pasquale
item.description:
‚Äúthe same article, Insider revealed that Decentraland, arguably the largest and most relevant Metaverse platform, had only 38 active daily users. The Guardian reported that the monetized content ecosystem in Meta‚Äôs flagship product Horizon Worlds produced no more than $470 in revenue globally. You‚Äôre not reading those numbers wrong. To say that the Metaverse is dead is an understatement. It was never alive.‚Äù
https://www.thenation.com/article/culture/metaverse-zuckerberg-pr-hype/
